comments:
When you install eclipse2.1.1-SDK-win-LanguagePackFeature,
you cannot create build.xml from plugin.xml with LanguagePack2.1.1.

In no LanguagePack, there are no problem.

Sorry, I could not find #39611.
Perhaps, this is duplicate report of #39611.

build.xml generation implementation has changed drastically in 3.0, so the 
piece of code causing the NPE might no longer exist.
